// string resource added by benjamin N6999 5 star hotel .96% Taj WestSide While registering as a new user on the app, you may have to provide us with some information that reveals your identity. These can also be information collected when booking a room in our hotel and making payment or when updating your user profile. Examples of these information includes; name, email, address, phone number, payment card information amongst others.
We also collect information from you when you browse through our app or use make use of certain services at the hotel such as wireless internet services. Examples of information collected here are country details, IP address and other features concerning your device may be collected too.
The privacy of the information you provided to us is of topmost importance. Which is why we drafted below the ways by which we collect, use and protect the information provided to us by you, either by browsing through our apps to see the details of our prestigious hotel or just by you actually booking a room with us. You are however not obligated to provide us with your personal information. Note that if you do not, we might be left with no choice than not to attend to you. Therefore, by using this app, you are aware of what information about you are being collected, stored, and disclosed as set out in the policy below. This policy was last updated October 20th, 2021.
Information collected by the above means is to ease the process of booking a room prior to stay by sending your details to the hotel and/or communication prior to stay. We also collect information for communication and satisfaction surveys on post-stay so as to get feedbacks on your experience and how we can improve our services in order to serve you better. Also in some cases where we have your permission, we may send you marketing communications such as discounts and latest updates in our hotels. Here in our company, we take utmost precautions to make sure your information are protected from misuse, unauthorised access, loss, interference and disclosure. However, safety of information can never be completely guaranteed but understand that we put the necessary security safeguards in place to protect it. However we retain the utmost right to make amendments to the privacy and policy as need arises. Please ensure you check the privacy policy from time to time to be abreast of any changes made. If you have any questions or more clarification about the privacy and policy, you can contact us through our phone contact, email or address as specified below.
Hotel Voyage Privacy Policy Information We Collect Why We Collect Personal Information How Information Collected Are Protected Changes To This Privacy and Policy How To Contact Us +234 8136678673 Decagon@gmail.com No 32, Okuorhomi community, along estate gate. Edo, Benin city

We present a wide choice of travel destinations and accommodation options, from vibrant city-centre hotels to tranquil beach-side resorts, all united by authentic service and modern, inviting spaces.
